mapper.select:
select m.*, a1.flmch1 name1, a2.flmch2 name2, d.ppmch pinpai from t_mall_product m ,t_mall_class_1 a1, t_mall_class_2 a2, t_mall_trade_mark d
where m.flbh1=a1.id and m.flbh2=a2.id and m.pp_id= d.id
